A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've seen it twice. I liked it better the second time. I really feel like the writer didn't know Luke Skywalker like the rest of us. Luke would be the first to step in and help his sister\, friends and the rebels.  there was so much squandered potential in this film. with that being said\, it was a solid and entertaining story. A little long\, but well done\, if you can overlook the character assassination of Luke.
